settings.text: Our product fragrances are made from natural ingredients and a combination of various essential oils. We DO NOT USE artifical fragrances in our products for health and environnemental considerations.

settings.title: Shea butter
settings.text: Great for moisturizing dry or damaged hair and protect hair from uv.

settings.title: Sweet almond oil
settings.text: Tame the frizz and make your beard softer and easier to comb

settings.title: Jojoba seed oil
settings.text: Non comedogenic, can soothe eczema, help cells generation, absorb quickly by skin, potent moisturizer with antimicrobial properties

settings.title: Grape seed oil
settings.text: Make skin softer and more elastic and is a powerful antioxidant.

settings.title: Castor seed oil
settings.text: Restorative and promote healthy skin growth and  anti inflammatory.

settings.title: Grapefruit bark oil
settings.text: Good for acne and help relieve stress and balance mood.

settings.title: Juniper berry oil
settings.text: Protect your skin, natural antiseptic and has relaxant properties,

settings.title: Sativa oil
settings.text: Tackles the signs of stressed skin, calming, soothing and reducing the appearance of redness,

settings.title: Coconut oil
settings.text: Moisturize, reduce inflammation and help build a richer lather. Also had antifungal and antimicrobial properties.

settings.title: Olive oil
settings.text: Rich in vitamins and fatty acids. Soothe skin and repel free radicals. Improve skin tone and texture.

settings.title: Beeswax
settings.text: Helps to style and keep the hairs together. Because it's a sealant it will also repel dirt and grime , as well as keeping the hair shiny.

settings.title: Tocopherol
settings.text:
Also known has vitamin e, its one of the best natural oils for prevention of beard dandruff and the dreaded itchy beard.

This is because it moisturizes the skin exceptionally well, reducing beard dryness (the leading cause of beard itch and dandruff)

settings.title: Citric Acid
settings.text: Acid is a natural organic acid present abundantly in citrus fruits such as limes and lemons. also has known skincare benefits. It belongs to the AHA family of acids, which supports skin exfoliation to reveal a fresh and firmer complexion. It is also an antioxidant used in anti-aging applications. It also help with the preservation of the product

settings.title: Guar gum

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

We named this fragrance  Old Tom in memory of an ancient gin type that was considered the ''missing link'' between the dutch genever and the london dry. Made from 100% natural carrier oils and essential oils, this grapefruit bark & juniper fragrance is fresh, not overpowering and will certainly help to wake up your senses on a rough morning!
